attributes.action: Close schools and colleges in tier 4.
attributes.additional_details: The parliament should close the schools whilst in tier 4 until we fall a level down the scientists have stated that children can still catch the virus, even though staff where masks to protect the children it doesn’t stop the virus affecting young children and adults the government need to review this immediately.
attributes.background: Whilst in tier 4 schools and colleges should remain closed but keep it open for vulnerable and disabled adults and children it’s unfair that children have to suffer mentally from going to school during a pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close schools in Tier 4 areas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564209

Close schools and colleges in areas under tier 4: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564318

The latest guidance on schools returning in January is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021/schools-and-childcare-settings-return-in-january-2021
